prompt: Design a recently viewed products page with a clean white background and a bold red app bar with the title 'Recently Viewed' in white text. The page should feature a vertically scrollable list of product cards with a minimalist design, using no shadows and sharp edges. Each card should have a white background with a thin red border, containing a square product image placeholder (light grey with a shopping bag icon) on the left, and product details on the right. The product details should include the product name in bold black text, a short description in grey text, the current price in bold red, and the original price crossed out in grey. Place an 'Add to Cart' button with a red background and white text at the top right of each card. Use ample padding for a spacious layout.
